docs.text: How to stay alive ¶ Just some notes to help anyone navigate the health landscape. I truly believe if I knew what I know now, I would have been able to avoid heart heart and other chronic diseases. Tip: Avoid the standard american diet. (SAD) Who am I? ¶ I'm just a guy who started having having health issues but did no know why. Why should you care? ¶ /Shrugs maybe some of this information will help someone, somewhere. If nothing else it is a cathartic exercise. I'm not a doctor. Use info at your own risk.
